item.title: (Eugene) coast range - $ 350
item.description: A like new Kahr CW9. I have only put 150 rounds through this pistol. Not one incident. I bought it to carry but have purchased a pocket pistol to carry. Included are two holsters, a DeSantis IWB leather and a Blackhawk belt, also two magazines. Comes with original paper work and box.

These retail $600 before shipping new if you can find them in stock.

item.title: (Wilmington) Glock 27 Gen 3 .40cal. - $ 600
item.description: lightly used .40 cal. with wolf 9mm conversion barrel, Truglo TFO sights, competition trigger system, extended slide release, extra finger magazine plates on 2 mags. original box. FTF with permit/concealed license or ffl to ffl. serious inquiries only please. no trades.

item.title: (Jacksonville) Norinco SKS 30rd, composite stock and scope! - $ 450
item.description: Norinco SKS. Very good shape. Black composite Monte Carlo stock. 30 round detachable polymer mag. Nice scope mount with off brand scope (famous maker?) 1-6x adjustable. Has clear picture and holds a steady zero. Open to trades let me know what you have! Feel free to text 704-617-1847. Thanks, Adam

item.title: (Florida) 300 WSM - $ 2,900
item.description: Ceracoated as a standard, MOA Actions come with scope base pin holes drilled between the scope base holes for extra lock down with heavier long range scope mounting solutions, 8x40 screws, not 6x32 like other production rifles, and have a bolt stop/release in the action, not the trigger.
